name: Promotion Class: Vindicator
description:
Role: Melee Damage

Forgoing heavier armor for superior damage, this bladesman has increased damage based on their mastery of fire.

Stat Adjustments:
Attack Power +150
Critical Strike +6%

Traits Granted:
Great Sword Mastery

Enhancements:
Holy Warrior: Now increases Holy Damage, no longer applies a Health buff.
Judgement: Now reduces the pip cost for casting by 1.
Divine Light: Now has increased damage, no longer heals.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Vindicator promotion class and prevents access to the Paladin and Fury promotion classes.
